attributes.action: To stop the murderes of James Bulger (Jon Venables + Robert Thompson) having their identities kept anonymous
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In 1993 James Bulger a 2 year old vulnerable and helpless todder was taken away from his mother by two boys named Jon Venables and Robert Thompson. They took him 2 and half miles away from the shopping center where they abducted him and gave him grievious bodily harm. They released in 2001, after ONLY 8 years in prison. They were given new identities to protect their safety. 
Now why should these thugs have their identities protected when they committed such a terrible crime, that even James Bulgers mother was not permitted by the police to identify her sons body as it was too traumatic.
Please sign your name so we can stop our tax payers money from protecting these two evil boys.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the courts.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
